validation.validation: The specified Location is inactive and hence cannot be associated with an EDI Customer Account Number.
Company is already included in one of the selected Company Hierarchies.
Enter one of the following: Order-From Connection, Company, Location.
Company Hierarchy is already included in one of the hierarchies selected.
Bill-To Address is not valid for the Company provided.
Only one Company can be assigned to a Bill-To Location Customer Account Number.
Modify Order-From Connection, Bill-To Address, Company or Location to avoid duplicate entry.
Just In Time Customer Account Number cannot be populated when Bill-To Address is populated.
Location cannot be populated when Bill-To Address is populated.
A Supplier Reference is required for Location Customer Account Numbers.
Either Customer Account Number or Just In Time Customer Account Number must have a value
